historical_updates.description: Historical inputs are populated correctly for the last three fiscal years with credible sourcing
historical_updates.scoring_guide: 1.0 = correct and complete historicals with sources; 0.5 = partial or minor errors; 0 = missing/incorrect

assumptions_summary.description: Entry, leverage, and projection assumptions are reasonable and internally consistent
assumptions_summary.scoring_guide: 1.0 = clear, defensible assumptions; 0.5 = partially reasonable; 0 = unrealistic or missing

returns_summary.description: Returns analysis (IRR/MOIC) and exit assumptions are coherent and supported by the model
returns_summary.scoring_guide: 1.0 = returns computed and consistent; 0.5 = partial or inconsistent; 0 = missing/incorrect

business_assessment.description: Business assessment covers market position, strengths/weaknesses, risks, and competitive landscape

recommendation.description: Go/No-Go recommendation is clear and supported by rationale and next steps
recommendation.scoring_guide: 1.0 = clear decision with rationale; 0.5 = vague; 0 = missing

model_integrity_checks.description: Model ties and reconciliation checks are validated after updates
model_integrity_checks.scoring_guide: 1.0 = checks explicitly confirmed; 0.5 = partial checks; 0 = no validation

formatting.description: IB formatting conventions and existing model style are followed for modified cells
formatting.scoring_guide: 1.0 = formatting consistent and correct; 0.5 = minor issues; 0 = incorrect formatting
